column2: "...Impressive. Honestly, I wasn't expecting humans to be this pathetic."
"The fools that were clawing at other's throats dropped everything to work together and fight back... I'm more amazed than I am upset."
"You've got it all wrong. Humans only understand conflict. History has proof enough of that."
"...For as many times as they have fought, they have also stood in unity throughout history."

"The downfalls of history are rife with man's
hubris. No matter the civilization, it is humans that bring them to an end."
"That is why we have decided they are unnecessary. That Photons are unnecessary."
"Humans are not needed in this universe... That was our conclusion. Without them, there will be no conflict."
"It won't be long before this farce is over. That wretched barrier will fall, our armies will march, and those insects will be crushed underfoot."
"This is our world. We can bring about any miracles we desire. Their fate is sealed regardless of how desperately they struggle."
"It's okay to close your eyes, Harriet, if you're afraid to watch them all die."

"No, I will not avert my gaze. I believe in
everyone, that they will persevere... They will come...!"
